website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable gripper to use with angled handle and long trigger for good control.
pros: Jaw rotates up to 360 degrees in 90 degree increments
Versatile tool able to handle most situations where you need a grabber
Simple design means this tool will be very easy to use
cons: Durability is a question mark with this grabber

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT QUALITY, SPEEDY DELIVERY!
customer_reviews.text: This is very useful at our house. We bought 4, for keeping in different areas of the house. I have arthritis and fibromyalgia, which makes getting a secure grip on items very difficult a lot of the time. I also am a bit short, but because of balance issues I try to avoid using step stools to reach higher shelves. I have tried at least 6 other grabbers, some cheaper, many more expensive, but none that worked as well. Thank you for a quality product at a good price.....I am recommending it to all my friends!
customer_reviews.author: LAURI CRUMLEY COATES

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality and very cheaply made....do yourself a favor and buy the ones made by ettore... they are far superior. I regret this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: So helpful for elderly
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I bought it for an elderly relative who is also short. When I took it out of the box I picked up her cordless phone off of the stand easily. At first she balked that she wouldn't need it but when she saw me easily grab things off of high shelves she quickly changed her mind. You can also rotate the claw so it is at a more convenient angle. For such a cheap price this is a great bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Stimpson

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Product is broken. The grabber part of it doesn’t open or close. The handle gets stuck when you press it as if the wire inside is broken. I would like a replacement of one that works please contact me or I will just send back for refund. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Sara813

customer_reviews.title: Vive Grabber - Broke in Two (2) Days
customer_reviews.text: The Vive grabber broke within two (2) days! Amazon gave me my money back. I had a Vive grabber before which lasted longer, but two (2) days isn't long enough to use. Connie Leistiko
customer_reviews.author: connie leistiko

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Thought I had done my research for a grabber to use for the laundry in a stackable washer/dryer. Need to get items out of the washer on the bottom of the stack. DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM! Poor quality, flimsy and trigger grip on this is not operational! I then found out the item is NOT returnable. Do not buy from this vendor. BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: Musea

customer_reviews.title: I've Bought Them for all my Friends!
customer_reviews.text: Great for picking up laundry, kitchen drops and dead mice! Heavy things like boxes and large ball bearings are a bit of a challenge. Great for getting that last sock out of the the back of the dryer!
customer_reviews.author: Pancho of the North

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy at all and caused injury
customer_reviews.text: If this product can withstand "thousands of uses," I want to know how they came to that determination. This is the second one that broke in 6 months from minimal use. Each time, the cord snapped and struck the user in the hand, causing pain and swelling. It's like strong fishing line that's used to cut grass, so it hurts when you get hit by it. Is the company going to send me 2 new ones? I'll order someone else's product and I advise you to do the same. The photos show the break in the line as well as how the bottom piece fell off once the line broke.
customer_reviews.author: carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Great price.
customer_reviews.text: First reacher grabber I have ever used (you get two) so I have nothing to compare them to. Can't see how these could be beat for the price, used one of them to do a little torture testing and passed my testing easily. Reached up and grabbed items off the upper cabinet shelves I had to use two hands to hold up, down to picking up a dime off the floor. I didn't get them to pick up ten pound even five pound objects so I don't know where the point of failure is. They work great for us.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just What we Needed
customer_reviews.text: The cats (our little darlings) slap various articles under our sofa frequently. These things are great at retrieval. While Christmas candles behind the sofa were the specific impetus for the purchase, there are many more immediately apparent applications certain to arise. This pair works much better than others we have had.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth DeVaughn

customer_reviews.title: Agile with Good Grip
customer_reviews.text: Feels like a quality picker upper. :) I think it will last much longer than the cheaper type I've tried and I like that it's solid construction. The only thing I can "nit pick" is the cable at the handle is solidly attached so it doesn't swivel. This will cause the cable to break at that spot from metal fatigue over time. Probably a long time but if this was used daily all day; this would be a good thing to correct at the factory level.
customer_reviews.author: R.M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product & Service
customer_reviews.text: This is my lifeline as I cannot get around at all & heartbroken as it left me useless right now & have to ORDER ANOTHER. It is ease of use & the end rotates to get things so easily. The best of all I tried. It even helps to straighten out my bed too-as I saw a review when I was looking thus it helped my search..May u enjoy one. Excellent response time & also customer service~You do stand behind your products. I HAVE A NEW ONE COMING!!!!
customer_reviews.author: cmist13

customer_reviews.title: Worthwhile
customer_reviews.text: There is not suction on this reacher. It is a quality reacher. Has a good handle. I like the feature that allows the grabber to turn. The grabbler is lined with a softer rubber that allows the reacher to easily pick up items. I didn't need two more reachers but bought this style because it is the best reacher/ grabber style to use. I gave it 4 stars because the is no hole in the handle to put a rope to hang the grabber. The designers need to add a way to hang the reacher.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl L.

customer_reviews.title: Warranty is lifetime and manufacturer is replacing unit that broke after four months.
customer_reviews.text: The reacher grabber is great for picking up many items. My only issue is that it broke after four months of limited use. Amazon directed me to contact the Manufacturer who has promised to send me a new reacher in order to honor their unconditional lifetime warranty. They aren’t requiring the return of the broken reacher grabber. Update: I received the new reacher from the manufacturer. I realize when using this, I need to be aware that heavy items can break the jaws which are simply strings.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Powell

customer_reviews.title: One of the grabbers broke first time I used it.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to do an update on my grabbers. I have been using one that works great. However, I put the other in the bedroom, and the first time I tried to pick up a soft empty plastic water bottle, it broke. I was shocked, and not happy. ---------------------- I really like my grabbers. They do exactly what I need them to do. I have picked up a penny, piece of paper, can, box, and much more. I will probably be getting a few more soon. I suggest if you are in the market for grabbers. Get these!! They are a great deal
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Starr Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply mad
customer_reviews.text: These work the same as My original review was somewhat neutral. These were backups for the RMI and Ettore that I have. These are cheap, both of them broke within a few minute's use. It was not the cable that broke rather the grabbers. And how did they break, I bumped them on the ground or against something and the internal mechanism that moves them snapped? This is a very poorly manufactured product, spend a little extra and get an RMI or Ettore, the more expensive blue grabbers.
customer_reviews.author: Mark T

customer_reviews.title: THE PERFECT REACHER
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 "VIVE REACHER GRABBER-32 inch EXTRA LONG, due to my back surgery. What a pleasure to have these reachers-one in the kitchen & the other in my bedroom. They are of excellent quality and workmanship, great length, since I 'm not allow to bend or stretch. The rotating hand works perfectly for picking up items in the home and in the garden. 'THANK YOU< VIVE HEALTH DIRECT" for great merchandise, sending out my order quickly and for packing the reachers very well
customer_reviews.author: sweetbonita

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight. Very useful.
customer_reviews.text: Secondary purchase. Really effective at picking up even loose change. Lightweight. Dependable. Just don't misuse the teacher for purposes other than intended. It can be damaged beyond usefulness. My mother tried to pry the heel of her shoes off and stretched it too far. It could not grip effectively anymore. Therefore, another 2 were purchased.
customer_reviews.author: KY girl

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality!!!  😣
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry to say this item was junk.One of them has already broken.I gave the other one to my son as a gift. (Before mine broke) I bought because it had good reviews. I knew as soon as I took them out of the box they were poor quality. I am very disappointed but Amazon is going to refund me.
customer_reviews.author: kim moore

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. The last grabbers that we had lasted for several years. This product worked for two days. Now it does not fully close the pinchers.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly A. Door

customer_reviews.title: A reliable, if a bit fragile, reached-grabber.
customer_reviews.text: I work part time in a care home and we go through reachers quite a bit. This product has been more reliable than the others we’ve used. The reacher has decent grabbing power. And the twist feature for the claws is really helpful. However, the grabber can be a bit fragile when used with heavy-handed users because the interior cable can snap.
customer_reviews.author: JKN

customer_reviews.title: It broke before it was even used.
customer_reviews.text: This 32 inch Viva Reacher Grasper broke with only 4 or 5 squeezes of the handle and never was used to grasp anything. The cable came loose from the grasper end and the device does not appear to be designed for repair. The manufacturer refuses to honor the "Lifetime Guarantee" because the device failed less than 30 days after receipt (less than 1 day, actually). Amazon claims the device is not returnable. I wasted $15.51 on this defective item and neither the manufacturer nor Amazon will replace it. They manufacturer finally agreed to replace. The replacement arrived with misaligned graspers by 1/3 of the width of the grasper. Manufacturer declines to refund or replace.
customer_reviews.author: STEPHEN F. DAUGHERTY

customer_reviews.title: Grip gives out
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this product. It has been many months since purchased so I can't return it. It has only been used randomly. Now the grip does not meet and will not pick up anything over 2" and poorly at that. The photo shows the grip area with the handle fully engaged. You are better off getting one from the dollar store.
customer_reviews.author: Mary D.

customer_reviews.title: These two save my bacon in my wheelchair
customer_reviews.text: I am able to reach things quickly. Jars in cupboards, small packages and other objects are easily gripped and brought down safely. Things that I have dropped on the floor, even the tiniest piece of paper are easy to retrieve. When needed I can turn the grip so that it can be used to grip a horizontal piece. I have two, one for my kitchen and one for my study. After buying one and using it often I bought the second one. Even if you are not handicapped this gripper is very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Marj

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Can pick up anything (except really heavy items). This perfect for picking up things in yard, like pine cones, sticks and tree bark. Squirrels knock down pine cones and eat them on ground, leaving debris to stick to shoes and track into house. Use this once a day and what a difference. Squirrels are unhappy, but I love it. Is lightweight and picks up 1st time, unlike my old one that took up to 4 times and adjustments each time used. Would recommend anyone who needs help picking up items to get this unit.
customer_reviews.author: HMSSMS

customer_reviews.title: can't live without these
customer_reviews.text: our home was built for giants, everything is so high for a woman 5'4. had to purchase stools and step ladders. Than a way to get my arms to reach what I wanted. worked with no slips and handle adjustment, fantastic. my other big problem was reaching inside my big deep tube LG washer. arms not long enough. these took care of that problem and these grips are gentle on all materials. even ladies delicates, or grabbing ahold of those men socks. now I have numerous so no matter where I am in my home, I can get to things
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Enormously helpful.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have gotten this sooner. I have recovered from some back problems and I want to be careful about pending over and pulling something. I'm an artist and often drop pencils or photos that are beyond reach. It works so easily to reach and grap things. Also coffee cups in cupboard. This is so helpful and it grips even the smallest leaves, pills, even pieces of dirt. It was a great help as I set up Christmas decorations and bulbs, etc kept falling about. I may get another, because I take it with me from second floor to the first.
customer_reviews.author: Cathie H.

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this item!  Defective and Not Returnable!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brand and style grabber through multiple hip surgeries for years now. I have several of them and wanted to add another one to assist me in other areas of my home. I received a defective one yesterday, and to my amazement, defective is irrelevant. It isn't returnable. I did not see that it wasn't returnable. My mistake, but since when does a company not replace a defective item? Never again will I buy from this company!
customer_reviews.author: melquist

customer_reviews.title: Do the job
customer_reviews.text: They are pretty good, they are not extra long I bought a couple others that are 32 in. The ones I was used to were the 34 in which are a little longer but are too expensive and suction cups tend to break much faster. I do like these and I do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pets Galore

customer_reviews.title: Lots of uses
customer_reviews.text: I love this grabber. Although I think I should have gotten a longer one. It is very sturdy and can grab some items that has a little weight. I mostly use it for yard pickup but have used it in many other ways. I have used it for picking up something I dropped, for stacking small wood kindling, grabbing stuff off a higher shelf, a back scratcher, and and to play toss the baseball with my nephew (the grabber retrieves the ball). I am wheelchair bound and this grabber gives me that little extra I need sometimes. I guess you could say it gives me back a little quality of life.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ease of pickup
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Easy pickup of items. If the reacher was sturdier I would give it 5 stars. This particular unit did not come with suction power - which it fine with me since I didn't want suction power. I am amending my previous rating to 5 stars. After having used the reacher a times I find that is is sturdier than it appears. Good product. Will order another one soon. August 26, 2019
customer_reviews.author: Dodie

customer_reviews.title: Works Really Well!!
customer_reviews.text: This grabber works really well! It has rubber tips and slightly curved ends which lend themselves well when trying to pick up items off the floor. I haven't found anything that this grabber wouldn't pick up - paper, envelopes, tracked in leaves, etc.
customer_reviews.author: randall vansweden

customer_reviews.title: My second purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was my second purchase of these grabbers. I bought one a couple of years ago for my mom, and we have used it so much, we decided to get two more to stash them throughout the house. We couldn't live our lives without them! With 5 dogs and MANY dog toys lying around, we use these grabbers all day long. And for reaching into the DEEP washing machine for socks and things that are out of reach of our short arms.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Truly helpful.
customer_reviews.text: I was given 3 different grabbers by friends after my surgery, this is one I ordered as part of a hip kit. There is no “suction” on this grabber but it has a strong grip. I have three now, one on each floor and may get more. I can even pick up a can with these. They were truly great help when I was limited from my hip surgery, now I use them for all kinds of projects.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Many Uses
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I use them to pick up my dog's toys scattered all over the yard. I use them in the house to pick up things that fall under the sofa or chairs. Also, the best use is pulling clothes out of my front end washer and dryer. My husband added a small magnet and he uses it in his workshop to pick up nails and screws on the floor. This is a great item for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: J.P

customer_reviews.title: I wish I could hang this up
customer_reviews.text: This grabber does what it's supposed to: It grabs. But I wish I'd bought one that had some sort of loop, hole or hook to be able to hang it up. It's awkwardly leaning against a corner in my kitchen, kind of in the way, in order to be handy when needed (which is often with our very tall cabinets). My suggestion would be to find one that you can hang on a wall or doorknob or hook of some kind.
customer_reviews.author: TBG

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use; Rotating Hand
customer_reviews.text: Grabber comes in handy for those hard to reach places. Sometimes the newspaper in the morning ends up underneath the car which is parked in the driveway. The Grabber makes it easy to grab the newspaper without have to go down on my tummy to retrieve. Can reach boxed items on a shelf that are light weight. Does not work as well on canned goods which tend to be heavier. I have 2 of them.
customer_reviews.author: DJ400

customer_reviews.title: vive grabber
customer_reviews.text: have only had these a few weeks but so far they are great. Last pair I had came from box retailer and they were good but broke when picking up too heavy material. For lighter weight pick ups, these seem to be good.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Kleier

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Easy to use and VERY sturdy. I have tried several other brand reachers and they didn't work well and/or broke quickly. I've purchased two of these to keep them in different areas of the house. It comes with paper work that says it's guaranteed. I dropped and badly damaged one. Pieces fell off and the inside parts fell out. I was not planning to use the guarantee as it was totally my fault. Well, I fiddled with it a bit and it has continued to work well for several months now. This is a great product! Don't fuss with any other brand.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste M.

customer_reviews.title: It gives you a good grip on tiny to at least 26oz
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. It will pick up a dime from carpet. It will pick up the large bottle of body wash when I drop it in the shower. I had purchased a similar item at a local pharmacy for 3 times the price. It was useless.
customer_reviews.author: JustJon

customer_reviews.title: Essential tool for those of us with lower back problems.
customer_reviews.text: It is great. I have a few of them. I use them many times each day, as I have limited movement. It’s little things like this that help keep life joyful.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Yeager

customer_reviews.title: Good, Sturdy Grabber
customer_reviews.text: I bought this teacher because I am short and had one that broke. I mostly use it to pull down paper towel rolls from the top cabinets and it works great for this purpose. I had another one which folded in half and had suction cups but one of the tension thingys popped off. This reacher is far more sturdy and functional than my previous one.
customer_reviews.author: H.M.

customer_reviews.title: to be determined
customer_reviews.text: as a wheelchair user reachers are a must have in our home, overall impressions are ehh time will tell. they fell kinda on the cheap side but some of the best things start that way
customer_reviews.author: bking

customer_reviews.title: GUARANTEE IS A FARCE!
customer_reviews.text: It was very useful until it broke and would not grab. I bought that one less that 6 mos ago not knowing it was guaranteed, which is a laugh because I tried to guarantee the new ones I bought with no luck. I think your company is a farce as backing up your product.
customer_reviews.author: Constance M.Pajak

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL, AMAZING, BACK SAVER!!
customer_reviews.text: These are AMAZING!! I am a retired Nurse, so as one can imagine, I have neck and back problems. These are ABSOLUTELY WONDERFUL. I have used them to pick up everything from a full 22oz bottle of lotion that fell to the floor, to a single scrap of paper, to a dime. I can not say enough good things about this product. I honestly use them daily. I have them in every room of the house. For me personally, they've been not only a back saver, but have given me the extra help I needed for many of my activities of daily living !!
customer_reviews.author: LISA

customer_reviews.title: Replacement of a Replacement
customer_reviews.text: The rubber grabber tips simply wore down after years of use, so I bought a replacement. Unfortunately the cord broke in less than a week. Customer Service rep was wonderful and sent a replacement which arrived quickly - Life Time warranty works. Hopefully I just got a lemon and this is not a sign of future durability.
customer_reviews.author: retired gardener

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled at first...
customer_reviews.text: But the item didn't last. It broke within the week. I now only use a metal grabber, not plastic. Refund was prompt & painless and the company was great to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra R. Palazzo

customer_reviews.title: Life changing!!
customer_reviews.text: Love! Love! Love these!! My mother and sister both got some of these and I was quite impressed, so I had to get a pair for myself! I have one in my room and one in my car. I drive an SUV and invariably things fall on the passenger floorboard or are in the backseat just out of reach. This is so handy! It will pick up all kinds of things from the remote that has dropped on the floor, to a single pill.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Powell

customer_reviews.title: Great Reaching Aid
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these grabber tools last year and loved it. It became so useful that I bought two more to store in other areas in my house. The tool is easy to use and it can pick up an impressive number of things...even tiny pieces of lint.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, if used properly.
customer_reviews.text: I've read previous reviews that criticize the fact that objects picked up cannot be too heavy. I agree, but it is clear that it was never intended for heavier objects. I use it primarily to clean up after trimming my landscaping. It's PERFECT for reaching between thorny plants to pick up stray clippings.
customer_reviews.author: David Wolff

customer_reviews.title: Cleverly designed pick up clamp.
customer_reviews.text: Long enough to easily reach the floor. Very cleverly designed pick up clamp. Thin enough at the tips to slide under whatever it is. Very positively closes tight around the object. The clamp rotates and locks back in place in the new orientation. Excellent ergonomic pistol grip and squeeze lever. Seems like it's built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Moore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect grabber!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for 4 years and love it. When I broke two ribs recently and could not bend, I used it for everything, from getting half-gallon milk off the bottom shelf to picking up spilled toothpicks on the kitchen floor. Really well made and smart -- this thing has been so useful, even outside picking up pine cones. Great product woth the extra it might be over other versions
customer_reviews.author: Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Good For Trash Pick Up
customer_reviews.text: Got my first Vive Reacher Grabber for Christmas, 2018. I walk the beaches three days a week and thought I'd help clean the environment while I get my exercise in. It is very lightweight and easy to use. They come with a lifetime guarantee but I failed to activate it. Too bad, since my first 2-pack lasted only 6 months at my surprise. I've just received my reorder but will definitely activate my guarantee this time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Grabber
customer_reviews.text: It works ok until you get any type of body oil or grease( your hand ) on it. I am constantly having to wash it after removing items from the jaws if I touch them.Yes, it has the power to pick up a dime but do not take the dime out of the jaws with your hand. Instead just drop it on a table, counter top, or bar.
customer_reviews.author: Kashton

customer_reviews.title: Needs hang up device
customer_reviews.text: I love the trigger handle. I don’t like that there is no hook to it up by. It works really well for picking up things.
customer_reviews.author: Terry B.

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Constructed
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made. As other reviews mentioned, wire thread is too thin, broke first day. There is a “no return” on this product. Going in trash. Stick with the yellow tipped jaw reacher/grabber. It has a firmer grip and hold. Much sturdier. I’m ordering 2 more to have available in different rooms.
customer_reviews.author: VAF

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Back Saver!
customer_reviews.text: I got one for indoor use and one for outdoor use. I have osteoporosis in my back. I use it for leaf litter, getting clothes out of a front loader and a hamper, reaching for small items on an upper shelf, putting can cat food on floor and picking it up and so many other things. The grabber is strong. It swivels. It pickups up very tiny objects off the floor. It is a very indispensable aid for me!!
customer_reviews.author: katz

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a life saver!
customer_reviews.text: As a disabled person with a weak grip, this has been a huge help! I can use it easily to reach things that I can't bend to pick up, or when I'm bed bound and can't reach. It makes my whole life just a bit easier, which opens up chances for me to apply my energy to other things and makes a surprising degree of difference.
customer_reviews.author: Irina Greenman

customer_reviews.title: LET THIS DO THE GRABBING FOR YOU
customer_reviews.text: I ORDER THIS A LONG TIME AGO. I LIKE IT SO MUCH, I KNEW I NEEDED OTHERS IN THE HOUSE. WELL I DID NOT GET THE SAME ONE. I TRIED ONE THAT FOLDED - NO GOOD - WOULD ALWAYS CLOSE UP. THE NEXT ONE HAD LITTLE SUCTION CUPS - LITTLE TO HOLD ON TO OBJECT. SO I DECIDED TO TO ORDER TO MORE OF THESE - CAN NOT BE HAPPIER.
customer_reviews.author: JOEZ

customer_reviews.title: PLASTIC UNSTURDY TRASH - NO RETURN/REFUND policy
customer_reviews.text: This thing feels SO cheap. It's shorter than stated on specs, the claw mechism broke immediately just hanging a shirt on a wire hanger AND ITS NOT ELIGIBLE FOR RETURNS even though that wasn't stated anywhere on the listing, so who would ever take that chance buying something with a hidden no return policy when there's so many others to choose from. Amazon shouldn't be selling garbage like this to Prime members unless there's a return policy. This thing is nothing but $30 trash
customer_reviews.author: Black Flags

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This grabber is great. It’s easy to squeeze the handle and you can pick up just about anything with it except very heavy items. Haven’t tried a coin yet but it would probably do it. I do suggest getting a 2 pack since the cord in it will eventually fray and break and while you might be able to replace that line with enough effort, it is cheap enough to just toss. Mine usually lasts close to a year.
customer_reviews.author: Mike JB

customer_reviews.title: Will be very handy to get things on the top shelf of the pantry and in cabinets!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, only complaint I have is that UPS-who NEVER does this!-left the package out at the road by my mailbox, which is 300 feet from the house. I made a complaint to UPS about it. All is great otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: LEAPH

customer_reviews.title: New type of handles are great!
customer_reviews.text: My husband doesn't move around much and had been using a grabber that has been in his family for years! He is thrilled with the new ones I got him and how versatile they are. He expecially like the way the grab part rotates. He is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful “ grabber “ . Someone gave me one as a gift last year and I ordered this one for my upstairs. This was recommended by a physio therapist and I find it to be awesome! It can pick up a tiny pill from the floor and saves my back on a daily basis . You won’t be sorry you bought this !
customer_reviews.author: Aileen Pilarski

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the Best!
customer_reviews.text: Love the well-designed handle - so easy to hold; perfectly balanced and proportioned. So much easier to use than those bulky ones I bought five years ago at the local big box store. Well worth the few more dollars. Bought one to give to a friend who’s having knee surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Magnolia Miss

customer_reviews.title: Good for heavier objects
customer_reviews.text: This device works very well for grabbing objects with weight, which many others do not. Its only drawback is that the "hands" are thick so they don't work well helping me put on my socks where a thin one can actually grab the sock from the inside and help slide the sock on.
customer_reviews.author: Harborlou

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for OTs!
customer_reviews.text: Really love this reacher. I'm an occupational therapist, and I always recommend this particular device to my patients. I love that you can adjust the hand of it (to grasp objects horizontally or vertically).
customer_reviews.author: B_Soemann

customer_reviews.title: Came on time and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. It has metal wire instead of a string. Have had a couple of different ones and string broke. The other one I have has picked up heavier things than I would try with cheaper models.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Mcafee

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my father and he absolutely loves them. First pack I bought though, one of the grippers broke. Not sure if it was broke right away or if my dad did something. But they work very well for him. He is even able to pick up a piece of paper with them. Happy with the purchases overall
customer_reviews.author: Laura L Glaser

customer_reviews.title: A versatile and handy tool
customer_reviews.text: My order included two grabbers a 32" and a 19". I was thrilled that they arrived a day earlier than expected because I am recuperating from surgery and not permitted to bend over. These grabbers are fantastic! I can even pick up pieces of uncooked spaghetti or pieces of thread from the carpet plus larger items like newspapers. I have been recommending them to friends. My daughter gave me one a few years ago for Christmas but the wire snapped. I am now aware of your guarantee, and have registered on line. Thank you for a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Great for Everyone!
customer_reviews.text: I got these because I have a bad back. All those years of being a military jet mechanic took its toll. My wife made fun of me getting these but now she likes to use them as well. Jokes on her; lol. Anyone can use these. It's just smarter than continuously bending over for things. We use them when we do laundry or need to reach our shoes in the back of the closet. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: you need this!!
customer_reviews.text: They are lightweight, but still sturdily made. This is very important for ease of use for those with disabilities that limit their abilities. The only thing I personally don't like, and it is not a negative, just my thought, it could be 3 to 4 inches longer.
customer_reviews.author: mark phillips

customer_reviews.title: Always handy
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this item yet, it seems sturdy and should work well since it's made of plastic & aluminum, my old one was pure plastic and was weak and broke. So far so good. When an item is made in China, there's a good chance it won't last too long.
customer_reviews.author: S. P. Escobar

customer_reviews.title: not very sturdy!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: not too sturdy I thought I was getting the ones with the suction grip but these arrived instead!!! they cant lift very heavy things well like a large remote control even people!!!!I'm not very satisfied witj these and may send them back!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: goldnuggetgal

customer_reviews.title: So handy!
customer_reviews.text: For a vertically challenged person like me and many in my family this has been a great resource. But it’s also helped us to grab items that have fallen behind large items out of reach. I have even given these to friends because it’s so handy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Magic grabber
customer_reviews.text: I have trouble at age 70 to pick things up. I have had it for a day. Can get clothes out of dryer, pick up grandson's clothes from bathroom floor, was able to grab packages of cardstock too high for me to reach. My climbing days are over.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Brown

customer_reviews.title: If you're short, you need these!
customer_reviews.text: My significant other is significantly shorter than most people, and these come in really handy for her. Well-made, sturdy, and just the right length to reach just about anything, whether at home, or while out shopping at the store.
customer_reviews.author: zilla

customer_reviews.title: Clamp It, Grab It
customer_reviews.text: I had a grabber that folds in half. I'm sure it wasn't supposed to fold in half when I was trying to reach and grab for an object. It would no longer lock in place. The auction cups kept falling off. So I found the grabber that doesn't have a lock. Hooray!!!! It's perfect for me. It doesn't have suction cups and it grabs with gusto. I recommend this type grabber to those who do not need it to fold to carry it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Weetman

customer_reviews.title: Broke very easily compared to the ones I've had in the past.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a little while ago but have only been using it for about a week and a half. I have some mobility issues and getting off my socks is quite a task. Both of mine broke trying to get a sock off my foot. They were very thin light cotton socks. Whatever it is that broke keeps it from picking things up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vive Reacher Grabber
customer_reviews.text: The Vive Reacher Grabber is an okay product that is good. The product itself works as described but unfortunately has a very thin weak metal wire that with time will eventually break. A much thicker stronger metal wire would be great. I am not sure if I will continue to purchase anymore of these items.
customer_reviews.author: JEZ

customer_reviews.title: Love mine.
customer_reviews.text: It’s plastic & not super tough or strong but I love the two I bought. I broke the wire in one grabber but replacing it with high lb strength wire with more tension was pretty easy. Now that one has some grab. Should have bought this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Korbly

customer_reviews.title: The Price Is Right
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, great price for 2. Rotating head is helpful and definitely can pick up small items. Heavier items like a soda bottle would work as long as the gripper can fit around it. Will work for our intended purpose, and I would purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B

customer_reviews.title: Nice little "grabber"
customer_reviews.text: This Vive Reacher/Grabber does exactly what I need it to do. It is able to pick up my dogs ceramic dish so it's sturdy enough. For the price you can't beat it. This is actually my second purchase and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby415

customer_reviews.title: When bending down is still easy, but getting back up ain't!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely useful tool to handle the well-documented fact that the floor gets lower each year after your 60th birthday. Pick up anything that's fallen, yank weeds, pluck fruit -- helps you grab just about anything that grabbing won't get you arrested.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence G. Blasko

customer_reviews.title: Check before you ship!!!!
customer_reviews.text: When the two grabbers arrived, every thing was sealed and secured, but one of the grabbers was bent and would not rotate. Clearly inspected when sealing for shipment didn't check this. The one grabber works ok.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST GRABBER EVER !!!
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best grabber I have ever bought, its nothing short of simply AMAZING Sturdy built handle has a nice heavy rubber high end feel it’s not cheaply built, the shaft is light alloy type material it’s SUPER SUPER STRONG, if you need a grabber this is your little helper for sure, I’ll be getting another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: one and done
customer_reviews.text: i really like the usefulness of this product .I used it one time to grab a piece of light insulation when i brought the grabber up close to me i noticed the grabber claws were not moving . I find out the plastic pins popped out of the cable mechanism inside the shaft / grabber .So i popped the 2 pins back in then the cable broke at the handle Handle with gentle care MIKE
customer_reviews.author: Mike  Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Horrible...Horrible...Horrible
customer_reviews.text: These reachers/grabbers SUCK!!! Within 3 weeks time, all 20 of these brand new grabbers were broken or coming apart. I will NEVER buy these again, and encourage others to steer clear unless you just have money to waste!!! 'Heavy duty grip arm'.....that was definitely a lie because that was the main part that came apart first!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bernabe Q.

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Never thought that I would need this but after my 6th back surgery I had no choice. This product is amazing and does as it claims.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: we have a big yard, but i dont wish to get dirty or see any type of bugs.. i was so excited when this arrived and one of the gripers didnt close properly, i said thank god i have another, well a few weeks later the metal that was holding together broke, i only pick up leaves with this, so i feel like it could of lasted longer.. now both are useless and it just wasnt worth the money, im very upset because its only spring.. i have lots more leaves on the ground
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Nave

customer_reviews.title: very useful extension
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why "Suction power" is a category. Maybe meant "Gripping Power" instead? In any case, it has great gripping power, it is nicely light weight and so far has been sturdy. It's the perfect length for reaching above our kitchen cabinets for chips or breakfast cereal - even a 1lb box of Kashi GoLean comes down without smashing the box or bending the grabber. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Peters

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This item works well for fishing my baby daughters toys out from under and behind furniture. The quality is nothing special, but it grips well and is still mechanically sound after quite a bit of use.
customer_reviews.author: Flying Eyeball Guy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Grabber Tool
customer_reviews.text: I got this to clean up stuff outside of the house. I went for a fixed arm instead of a folding arm, hoping that makes it a bit more sturdy. This is called heavy duty but because of how long the arm is, it'll still be difficult to pick up anything to heavy with it. Still, very handy to have!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Li

customer_reviews.title: my aunt loves it.
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for my aunt. she 94 years old and can't do as much as she use to. she loved it. i tried it and found that it can be a useful tool in my home.. i'm thinking about buying one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: MS WANNABUY

customer_reviews.title: Good grabbing!
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses this for everything! She had a major back surgery and is not allowed to bend. She uses this to grab everything, open drawers and grab clothes, pick up her shoes, pull up her pants. This works great.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Williams

customer_reviews.title: Better Grabber Than Local Stores
customer_reviews.text: This grabber is better than any I've found in local stores. It is sturdy and lightweight. The grabber end can be rotated to make the pick-up easier as you don't need to rotate your hand to pick up odd items.
customer_reviews.author: Charles V Ruffin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect grabber
customer_reviews.text: Probably won't lift a lot of weight; but, it picks up whatever I drop in the kitchen & all of my dog's toys very well. I ow have 4 of these around the house. Huge help for an old lady.
customer_reviews.author: DeeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great grabber!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my grabber. It actually holds some weight unlike others I've seen. It's very sturdy. The turning is a lil wonky but handy. My in-laws saw it and after a lot of questions they had me order them one too. My mom in-law had bsd experiences with other ones in the past and has been so impressed with this one. It's a great length to help us shorties lol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vive grabbers are my favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased many different grabbers over the years. The Vive Grabber is my favorite. I dislike the types of grippers with the cups, I much prefer this style with the textured pincher.
customer_reviews.author: SuSuz

customer_reviews.title: Reach and get it
customer_reviews.text: I had surgery on my eye. I wasn't allowed to bend from the waist. This is perfect for picking up coins even small pieces of paper. I have two of them, one upstairs and one downstairs. Allowed to bend, but I keep it handy.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

product_meta.title: Vive Reacher Grabber 32" - Extra Long Mobility Aid - Rotating Hand, Heavy Duty Grip Arm - Reaching Assist Tool for Trash Pickup, Litter Picker, Garden Nabber, Disabled, Handicap Arm
feature_bullets: 32” PATENTED DESIGN FOR ADDED REACH: Pick-up items from the top shelf, floor, lawn or behind furniture. Save your back and avoid a stepping stool. Also great for picking up trash or other items you don’t want to touch.

BUILT TO LAST: Updated 2019 internal mechanism is built from sautered steel wiring to last for tens of thousands of pick ups. Can pick up items as large as 5 lbs. Rust-proof frame will hold up to heavy duty outdoor use.

ROTATING & RUBBERIZED JAW: Jaw can rotate a full 360 degrees in 90 increments to be used both vertically and horizontally for hard to reach places like behind furniture and appliances. Coated with anti-slip material allowing you to lift slippery items like glass or smooth plastic bottles.

CONTOURED HANDLE AND TRIGGER: Padded, anti-slip handle and contoured trigger matches the natural shape of your hand for comfortable, pain-free use. Especially important if using for extended periods of time.
LIFETIME GUARANTEE: Your reacher grabber is backed by a lifetime guarantee. Order now with confidence

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
